section.title: Eclipse XSLT installation
section.para: The Eclipse XSL Project allows to edit XSLT files and perform interactive XSL transformations in Eclipse.

In case you want to use Eclipse to perform your transformation you can install the
Eclipse XSL Developer
plugin via the
Eclipse update manager .

section.title: XSLT transformations with Eclipse
section.para: This chapter explains how to use the Eclipse tooling to do your XLS transformation. We again use the simplest transformation of just copying the data. Create a new project of type General in Eclipse called de.vogella.xslt.first . Create a folder files .
Create the following XML file source.xml in the folder files .
Create the following transform.xsl file in the files folder.
Select your xsl file and run it as XSL application.
Select Open Files... and select source.xml . Press OK to run it.
